$40/hour
Consultation & Planning
No commitments – we meet and talk about your marketing goals, and we suggest a plan accordingly.
$200
Set-Up of Accounts
We will set you up with an inviting profile in each of these social media networks, attracting users to interact with you. This involves what is called "copywriting," that is, writing related to advertising your business. We think about the tone, diction, and your target audience. Once you are set up, you manage the interaction thereafter.
starting at $400/month
Monitoring and Interaction
We sign in to the accounts everyday and interact with other users. Your profile itself, without an active human behind it, will be pretty useless. If you sign up for this service, we will respond to comments, forums, and look for leads using your business profile! This also includes damage control. Using Google Alerts, we will be alerted every time someone mentions your company online. If they say something negative, trust us, you want someone to counteract that.
$200 for a plan/$500+ for implementation
Marketing Campaign
If you already have these accounts up and running, and you want to promote a new service or boost sales, we help you by thinking of a promotional campaign that is within your budget, and that will attract your target audience. (An example is the Starbucks Rewards Cards or Clearly Contacts' discount codes given to those who "liked" them on Facebook)
$100 per article (approx. 500 words)
Copywriting
Copywriting is the artistic skill of putting words together to promote an idea, person, business, or product. We help you present your brand or product well and in the tone that reflects its nature. Are you targeting business people?? Are you trying to reach youth? Females? Males? We consider such factors along with the nature of your business or products in choosing words to engage your audience and evoke a response or emotion out of them.
starting at $750
Website Development
As business trends evolve, aesthetics and style trends do as well. Perhaps, your website needs to be revamped. Our consultants are able to design your website so that it is user-friendly, and pleasing to the eye of your prospects. We customize your website to YOUR brand and apply SEO (search engine optimization) techniques. Improve your first impression!
